ACT
62
Submission of accounts and rewards to the executor
The executor of the will is obliged to submit to the court an account of his work, and is responsible for the damage he has concealed.
The executor of the will has the right to reimbursement of expenses and to an appropriate reward for his effort, which will be paid to him on the basis of the court's decision at the expense of the estate, but not thereby reducing the value of the necessary part.
